title: Adenauer: Germany reborn
creator_credit: Don Thompson, New York Times Productions and Nielsen-Ferns
brief_description: A presentation of the career of Adenauer, West Germany’s Chancellor from 1945-1963. Provides footage of the concentration camps, the Nuremburg trial, the Allied occupation of Germany, the Berlin airlift of 1948, the establishment of a new government in Bonn in 1949 and the building of the Berlin wall. Pro American narration by Henry Fonda.
